title: Carrying Cloth, 1995-50-329, 1st half of 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: paste resist and dyed using Tsutsugaki technique on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 88cm (34 1/2in.)
Weft ( 2 selvedge to selvedge pices seamed together0 69.5cm (27 1/8in.)
description: Design of a hexagonal box filled with decorated clam shells, loose painted clamshells and an ornamental braid. A family crest is at the lower right.
